description:
While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des nouvelles de l`équipage. La science de la météo et l`île à la super technologie
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Tenkou no Kagaku to Karakurijima
Nami e la scienza del vento
The Friends` Whereabouts: The Science of Weather and the Mechanical Island
Небесный островок Погодия и Механический остров
仲間達の行方 天候の科学とからくり島
